trans-unit.source: Allow local network: If accessed from the local network ignore selected useNetworkAddress option and allow the local network address. Selects the highest authorized user who logged in the last.
Disable in Production context: Disables all IP logging and extension functionality in production context for security reasons.
Display accounts: Display accounts instead of automatically logging you in the first account with the highest privileges. No password required if chosen from these accounts. (Not implemented yet)
Limit to DDEV context: Limit all IP logging and extension functionality to DDEV context only.
Network Mask: What network mask should get used(default 255.255.255.0). Changing this will result in invalid saved network addresses, and you have to log in once again to refresh the entry.
Use network address: Use the network address instead of the ip address
Disable Multi-Factor-Authentication: Disables the Multi-Factor Authentication if allowed based on your network information.
